trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_SEQ_00<tab>Pauline, a conjurer at Gabineaux's Bower, seeks an able adventurer to cull the local hoglet population.

TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_SEQ_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Pauline at Gabineaux's Bower.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
※The Main Scenario Guide shows the next available quest. You can toggle it on and off in Character Configuration, under UI Settings.
TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_SEQ_02<tab>You have butchered half a dozen hoglets. Report to Pauline at Gabineaux's Bower.
TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_SEQ_03<tab>Pauline senses the elementals' joy at your efforts to restore the natural balance. Each small victory brings stability to the forest's cycle of life.

TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_TODO_00<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Pauline at Gabineaux's Bower.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_TODO_01<tab><var 48 F20215 /var><var 49 F20216 /var><var 12 40 /var> This quest has been adjusted. Please abandon the quest and restart it by speaking to Pauline at Gabineaux's Bower.<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_PAULINE_000_1<tab>If you might spare the time, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, I would have you thin the numbers of hoglets in Greentear.

TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_PAULINE_000_2<tab>While these beasts have always called the Twelveswood home, their appetite has grown so insatiable of late that I fear they will devour every nut on the forest floor. The cycle of life cannot well sustain such gluttony.
TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_PAULINE_000_3<tab>I must ask you to slay at least six of the creatures. Their sacrifice will be to the greater good of the Twelveswood, I assure you.

TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_PAULINE_000_11<tab>The life of the forest relies on a delicate balance, and the unchecked proliferation of beasts would mean a slow but certain death for the Twelveswood. It is our duty to correct such imbalance, and swiftly, even if it means shedding blood...
TEXT_SUBFST042_00198_PAULINE_000_12<tab>Though it may seem trivial, you have performed a vital service this day. May the elementals bless your future endeavors.
